mapper.update: BEGIN POLR044A_PKG.EXTRACT_POL_WRITTENCOMP(#{extractUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lineCdParam, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cedingIdParam, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateParam, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateRange, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAST(to_timestamp(#{fromDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), CAST(to_timestamp(#{toDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), #{incRecTag, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extractCount, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}); END;
